enhanced_by.reason: Parameter validation is required before making the request to ensure the parameters are correctly formatted.

enhanced_by.method_name: requestHandler.sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: The request handler must be invoked to send the signed request to the server.
Both methods involve querying historical data and can share similar response structures and error handling.
Parameter validation can also be used to assert that the response parameters are correctly formatted.
